title: How to create my own music for YouTube - Quora

response.answer_text: I suggest you to use non-copyright music because then you will get no copyright strike or claim for the music. I have some channels names like no copyright sounds (NCS) free blog music or there are many other that you can find on YouTube. just search non-copyright music to use and you can find every type of music like a vlog music or electronic music of your choice But if you still want to music like on your own. I’ll suggest you to use a digital audio workstation like the one I use named FL studio FL studio is very user friendly so you can use their software to create music for yourself and then you can use that music for your video and it will be hundred percent yours. SO NO COPYRIGHT CLAIM THING

You can try FL Studio. FL Studio is a music producing software used around the world by many good music creator. (List : Power Users) With it, you can create almost every style of music and install some VSTs (plugins) for more music effects. There is a trial version but a real version is not that expensive (starting at 99$).
